summary: The conversation is between an AI assistant representing a P2P lending platform and a customer named Mr. Kumar. The customer had made a lending investment of a certain amount and is inquiring about the repayment schedule and any referral offers.
questions_asked:
- When will the remaining amount of the lending investment be repaid?
- Will the customer receive any referral rewards for referring his wife and friend?
overall_sentiment: Positive. The customer seems satisfied with the platform's performance and is exploring additional opportunities to invest and refer others.
